Posts.Content: Hi tmh I started Anastrozole in January this year and do have the hot flushes and my arthritis is much worse every joint seems to be screaming some days! It is a side effect but I have found I now get a good day now and again so determined to continue. I have tried a few things too (paradox oil). As I say some days are much worse than others. I take mine at bedtime so the worst seems to over before lunchtime. I have not heard of anyone not being affected by these. I hope you feel better soon. Take care x Enter your message...
Posts.Title: Anastrozole

Posts.Content: Hi Angel As everyone else has said pls do not feel alone we have all been there. The waiting is perhaps the cruellest part and my heart goes out to you. I am 7mths over my mastectomy and 16yrs over my bowel cancer so understand the feeling of  being alone with your fears. When you know you face chemo and radiotherapy it can be very depressing. I cried so much I said I am not going thru Chemo after having Bowel surgery, but I did so am here 16yrs later, age 62. I have to say my breast cancer was a more positive experience as I thought it would be like my earlier cancer. There is such a rapport with your fellow patients lots of  tears but lots of laughs too. Please don't b afraid to ask for help from here or your nurses/Gp We can all help. Love and best wishes xo Enter your message...

Posts.Content: I had a mastectomy in late November last year. I am having problems with seroma in my breast, it has been drained 6 times now and fills up very quickly after draining. 100 mls last time. Anyone else have this problem? Its very tight and sore but do not want to keep getting it drained incase of infection. Many thanks
Posts.Title: Seroma problems

Posts.Content: Many thanks George and Jackie have had it aspirated 6 times now as get very sore and swollen, however last one was 15th May and only 80mls this time Not over 100 to 150 as before. Has come back up again but am able to wear bra now and yes the compression does seem to help. I got good news last week, they got all the cancer and the radiotherapy seems to have worked its magic. Hope you are well x Enter your message...
Posts.Title: Seroma problems

Posts.Content: Thank you everyone for the advice re my seroma. Very kind of you all to reply. I was advised not to wear any bra for a while, then to wear a soft one for support. Just seems to b my system not wanting to start draining itself! I am going to try and wait until my appt at end of may b4 getting it drained again.
Posts.Title: Seroma problems

Posts.Content: Yes it has helped a bit by wearing a bra, got it drained for the sixth time on 15th May and only 80mls this time instead of the usual 100-150. Has come back a bit but good news is that it seems my cancer is gone and radiotherapy did its job! Thank you so much for taking the time to reply

Posts.Content: Hello I had my mastectomy Nov last year. I have a seroma which has been drained 7 times and has filled again. I still am very sore below underarm to touch feels like sharp pain if I touch and also on the breast area. Anyone else have this? Grateful for any advice
Posts.Title: pain under arm and breast site

Posts.Content: No its not in your head! I felt that way after first 4 sessions but I did get much more tired and slept a lot. It affects everyone differently I was still sleepy and dizzy for about four weeks after treatment ended Use your cream on your skin always. Listen to your body and REST! Good luck xo Enter your message...
